refinement_log.change: System reset - cleared all unverified data

refinement_log.reason: Unprecedented market conditions: $5T stimulus, zero rates, meme stock mania, pandemic anomalies. These patterns are not repeatable in normal markets.
refinement_log.impact: Pattern discovery will use only 2014-2019 and 2022-2024 data. COVID-era stocks archived for reference but excluded from screener development.
refinement_log.backtest_performance_after: Pending - will ensure screener works in normal conditions

current_criteria.note: Will be updated based on pattern discovery from CLEAN dataset (excluding 2020-2021 COVID era)

metadata.methodology: Data-driven refinement based on backtest results and false miss analysis
